channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12584] Disable browsing the static directory in HttpServer2
item.description:
We found a minor security issue with the Yarn Web UIs (or anything using HttpServer2. Currently, you can list the contents of the /static directory for the RM, NM, and JHS. This isn't a huge deal, but there are some ways to abuse this to get access to files on the host, though it would be pretty difficult. It's also good practice to disable directory listing on web apps.

Here are the URLs:

  • http://HOST:8088/static/
  • http://HOST:19888/static/
  • http://HOST:8042/static/
item.summary: Disable browsing the static directory in HttpServer2

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Simple fix sets org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.Default.dirAllowed to false. I verified that with the patch you can't browse the files anymore.
I remember this was always the case with all of our daemons, not just YARN UIs, isn't it?
This should fix anything using HttpServer2.

-1 overall

steve_l, varun_saxena, can one of your review the updated patch?
LGTM, +1.
+1 from me, too
Committed this to trunk, branch-2, and branch-2.8. Thanks rkanter for updating the patch and thanks steve_l for your review.
